website_summaries.verdict: For people who use heavy cookware over their fire pit and want something heavy-duty that will last a long time.
pros: The price is lower than some grills
Made from an extra-sturdy steel that can either sit in a fire ring or go directly over a campfire
Can also be used as a base to lift logs for a pit that is too high
A very good product for the money
cons: The slats on this grill are wide and might allow some foods to slip through the surface into the fire

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This is the new fire pitt my husband built and places this in there. It fit right in and I love the look of it. He did not have a problem placing this in the fire pit and was very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Alain alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty grate
customer_reviews.text: This is one well made, heavy fire pit grate. Fits perfectly inside my fire pit kit that I purchased from the “big box store.“ This is a must have to keep the air circulating around the logs. No problems with the packaging as the grate was undamaged during shipment. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sun M

customer_reviews.title: It was super well packaged
customer_reviews.text: I just received it my Titan grate! It was super well packaged...the grate is heavy...this is the real thing - very well built - it fits perfectly in my home made Firepit. It looks like a commercial grate, not the cheap one you see all the time. You can place blocks under the grate legs if you want to see your burning logs more or less.We'll have nice family get togethers around this Firepit. Thank you Titan! VERY happy!
customer_reviews.author: FKL

customer_reviews.title: excellent grate
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and works perfectly for me. I have it for about a month now and have burned at least 15 fires on it - still looks good as new and no burn marks on it
customer_reviews.author: Kunal Ghosh

customer_reviews.title: Best value
customer_reviews.text: Used this in a fire pit I built. Great construction and weight to handle a good fire. Allows for airflow with big grate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: When it arrived the package was destroyed, so we were a bit worried. Grill was fine, fits perfectly and we anticipate a long time relationship.
customer_reviews.author: longrange

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: We were both impressed with the firepit grate. Very heavy and sturdy. Perfect for the round pit my husband built. Can't wait to use
customer_reviews.author: Nancy from ct

customer_reviews.title: Great grate!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this grate! Arrived sooner then expected, stronger then I expected and I know our fires around our fire pit will be much better thanks to this FireGrate!
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect grate for our backyard fire pit!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome grate - exactly what we were looking for but couldn't find locally. Fits perfectly in our 36" fire pit, and extremely heavy duty to last through many years of bonfires. In hindsight, we built our fire pit a little too tall, so the additional 4" grate height will get our logs up a bit higher so we can feel the heat more while sitting in our chairs around the perimeter of the pit. Very quick delivery - thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: dsn913

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: I bought this grill to place in the bottom of my round 40 inch steel fire pit. It will work perfect to keep the cut wood from collecting in the bottom. Extremely sturdy and very heavy. Great black coating !! Couldn't be happier. Would buy again in the future if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mark LaPierre

customer_reviews.title: This is a definite buy
customer_reviews.text: I have to say after buying camping equipment for almost 20 years I have never found a product they gives you so much for your money this thing is incredible strong sturdy and well-built outstanding
customer_reviews.author: Amazon David

customer_reviews.title: Very solid!!
customer_reviews.text: this things is very solid, and very cheap compared to the rest of the grates I looked at.
customer_reviews.author: Steve L

customer_reviews.title: very heavily made
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect i bought two or them for camping spaces i rent out. Just fits and is very stout
customer_reviews.author: mark ludeman

customer_reviews.title: Rusted with 48 hours
customer_reviews.text: We were so excited to get our new fire pit grate, but after putting it outside for two days, with no rain, multiple spots of rust appeared. Very disappointed. Unfortunately the item is no longer available for us to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Emilee Purcell

customer_reviews.title: Night and day difference in my fire pit
customer_reviews.text: Immediately noticed a less smokey, better burning fire in my bonfire pit. This thing is well built and super sturdy. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wojan

customer_reviews.title: As advertised!
customer_reviews.text: It is heavy duty as advertised. It fits down into my fit pit perfectly...I added a brick under each leg just to add more air space under the grill to create more air flow when burning logs. Great price. Arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: T. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice heavy duty, fits my 36" round fire pit.
customer_reviews.author: L&E

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Fits great in our fire pit. Very sturdy. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Spicer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Strong, heavy duty, won’t become damaged by high heat. No warping .
customer_reviews.author: gizmo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality / great price
customer_reviews.text: Best built grate money can buy ! Very heavy duty & fits perfectly in the bottom of the 32" ring with grill also available on Amazon through Titan Attachments. Fast shipping, looking forward to finishing my fire pit with brick & stone this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan E. Sorensen

customer_reviews.title: Well built, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Well built. Heavier than what I expected, which is great, so it can hold up over time. Bought it to go into my 36’’ fire pit to add airflow and works great. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM KEEFE

customer_reviews.title: We spray painted with high heat grill paint and it's fine now.
customer_reviews.text: Used one time and then there was a small rainstorm a few days later. Rust showed up the next day! We spray painted with high heat grill paint and it's fine now.
customer_reviews.author: Rhea Davis

customer_reviews.title: Pure steel,  excellent price!
customer_reviews.text: I looked all over for this grate couldn't find it nowhere for a decent price until I found it on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: BlkSuprMan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what we wanted fits perfectly in our new patio fire pit!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Brown

customer_reviews.title: Look no further! Buy this one!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect grate for our outdoor firepit. Very heavy and well made. It actually measures 30.5” but still fit perfectly in our firepit. We will surely be able to use this for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: JFM

customer_reviews.title: Well made, durable, heavy.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in our stone fireplace. Lifts the wood off the brick to allow airflow.
customer_reviews.author: Joe D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit. Works well at keeping air under fire
customer_reviews.text: I use this inside a Nantucket Ledgewood (round) fire pit. Perfect fit. Works well at keeping air under fire. Much better than burning wood on the sand.
customer_reviews.author: SDA17

customer_reviews.title: The quality is good but it was not the exact measurements and did ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality is good but it was not the exact measurements and did not for in our iron ring, which we measured before purchasing this.
customer_reviews.author: DANIELLE DUEX

customer_reviews.title: Not a good surface to cook
customer_reviews.text: been ouside fro a bout three weeks now it is rusting. Not a good surface to cook on
customer_reviews.author: James E. Mcgonagle

customer_reviews.title: grate for camp fire pit
customer_reviews.text: This is just perfect. Heavy duty just like advertised. Price was right. So very glad I chose this product over all of the others.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Good Heavy Duty Grill
customer_reviews.text: It was a great fit inside our circlular fire pit. Heavy weight and glad it had 5 legs instead of the usual 4 legs.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for my firepit!! works great and is very well made!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Krems

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be very well constructed and very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: deej

customer_reviews.title: Great For My Fire Pit
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Heavy duty and well made. See some light surface rust already but not unexpected. A little heat paint should clean that up.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Well-built
customer_reviews.text: Rarely do I rate products but this is clearly a 5-star worthy item. It's a sturdy, well-built grate that is sure to last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Fred M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect fit for my stone ad on fireplace with the built in metal ring
customer_reviews.author: David Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: Solid steel
customer_reviews.text: It worked perfectly! What a difference the grate makes, allowing air flow and oxygen to get underneath the wood. It really helped get the flames up.
customer_reviews.author: Marius

customer_reviews.title: Used it for inside our firepit and it works great!
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly and is heavy. Used it for inside our firepit and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Pistani

customer_reviews.title: Great fire pit grate
customer_reviews.text: Great fire pit grate. It is very sturdy. Too bad I didn't measure perfectly. It almost fit. My fault. I ordered the 28" grate to use.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Item is exactly as advertised. Very high quality, ...
customer_reviews.text: Item is exactly as advertised. Very high quality, heavy material design and well crafted. Used it in a backyard fire pit to hold wood off of the ground to increase airflow and circulation. Fire lasted for hours.
customer_reviews.author: U.P.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well made
customer_reviews.text: This thing is solid and fits my fire pit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and fits perfectly in the fire pit. It's elevated so you have air flow underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy W

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Needed a grate strong enough for shrimp boils and this is doing great!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Mooney

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the weight and quality of this grate. Well worth the money and looks fantastic in my fire pit. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dave E.

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect for our fire ring
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty grill. It is perfect for our fire ring!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Armitage

customer_reviews.title: great grate
customer_reviews.text: perfect size and very rugged. just what i wanted and half the price of the others.
customer_reviews.author: bender101

customer_reviews.title: This "grate"
customer_reviews.text: A bit heavier than I though. It will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Raz...

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted and got!
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly as described and commented on by other customers.
customer_reviews.author: Christie H

customer_reviews.title: Awesome grate. Very sturdy and solid and well made
customer_reviews.text: Awesome grate. Very sturdy and solid and well made. Should last for years. Product OD is 30.5" and fit perfect inside my firepit.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Foley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. Looks nicer than we expected. It is made very well.
customer_reviews.author: shawna

customer_reviews.title: ... thing is a beast - solid thick steel with good welds. Will support a grown man
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast - solid thick steel with good welds. Will support a grown man, maybe a pickup truck. great for my fire pit.
customer_reviews.author: Justin B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality,as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed to complete our fire pit. Very well made at an affordable price. Four inches off the ground to keep air flow for making great fires.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Mackay

customer_reviews.title: Nice grate but...
customer_reviews.text: I love the grate itself but in sitting outside just one afternoon, it rusted significantly. And it didn't even rain! It is too heavy to move inside every time I use it so I guess I'm stuck with a rusty grate.
customer_reviews.author: Hippie Mountain Chick

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, don't know why it isn't sold with the build it yourself fire pit sold at Lowe's.
customer_reviews.author: roger bass

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. Fits perfectly in the 36" pit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, very disappointed. After one use on the fire it has discoloration and looks rusted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Very heavy and a perfect addition to our firepit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: Very well made with quick delivery. I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as expected and dropped right in, will be firing it up soon!
customer_reviews.author: MLD
